answers.question: Telegram Handle We Can Use To Contact You
Link to your Public Group Chat
Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile to prior rounds.

answers.answer:
MiniBridge has significantly contributed to the Ethereum network’s infrastructure and enhanced web3 user experience, especially for retail investors who care about bridge costs and speed. MiniBridge has served over 465K unique users with 786K total transactions across Ethereum and its layer 2 networks. The detailed metrics can be seen in the Dune dashboard: 
https://dune.com/biteye/minibridge-stats
answers.question: How does your project contribute significantly to the Ethereum network's infrastructure? Please provide specific examples and metrics if available.

answers.answer: MiniBridge has developed an innovative solution by implementing an EOA and smart contract combined hybrid bridge. It helps to reduce the possibility of contract exploitation and hence increases system security. The benefits of this solution are that it can significantly reduce gas fees, and bridge costs while accelerating cross-chain speed. MiniBridge is currently the fastest and cheapest bridge solution across the market. In the frontend, MiniBridge UI shows the total bridging time to users for better presentation and comparison.
answers.question: Describe any pioneering development work in your project, particularly in enhancing privacy, interoperability, or user experience.

answers.answer:
Ethereum network and its L2s have been growing exponentially and there's a great demand to transfer assets among these blockchains. 

Current bridges face various problems, including insufficiently supported networks, long bridge time, expensive bridge fees, potential security risks, and gas top-ups for non-ETH native tokens.  These problems prevent the Ethereum network from its fast-growing path and affect user experience. 

MiniBridge has come up with an innovative solution by implementing an EOA and smart contract combined hybrid bridge. It helps to reduce the possibility of contract exploitation and hence increases system security. The benefits of this solution are that it can significantly reduce gas fees, and bridge costs while accelerating cross-chain speed. MiniBridge is currently the fastest and cheapest bridge solution across the market. In addition, it has a gas swap feature to help top up gas tokens on the destination chain. MiniBridge has opened the API docs for a broad integration by other third-party dApps. MiniBridge has already been integrated to RawR (Bridge Aggregator) and more social apps in the near future.

We believe MiniBridge significantly contributes to the Ethereum network’s infrastructure and enhanced web3 user experience, especially for retail investors who care about bridge costs and speed.
answers.question: What specific problems or challenges in the Ethereum ecosystem does your project address? How does your solution improve upon existing alternatives?

answers.answer:
Milestone #1: Development and Integration on Major L2s 

Goals:
- Set up an L2 dashboard showing network status and ecosystem project metrics
- Mini Bridge Integration and launch on major L2s
- Finalize a third-party security audit

Milestone #2: Development and Integration on major BTC L2s 

Goals:
- Mini Bridge Integration and launch on major BTC L2s
- Open the bridge routes between ETH and BTC L1/L2 networks

Milestone #3: Referral Rewards and Data Analytics

Goals: 
- Set up a referral rewards system to incentivize product sharing.
- Set up Mini Bridge data analytics dashboard on Dune or Defillama 

Milestone #4:  Community Growth

Goals: 
- Reach at least 3,000 DAU (a daily active user is a user that submits at least 1 tx per day).
- Collaborations with ecosystem partners to further expand the market.
- Regular social media spaces & marketing campaigns
- Add support for stablecoins and cross-chain swaps.


Milestone #5:  Brand Expansion
 Goals: 
- Reach at least 10,000 DAU (a daily active user is a user that submits at least 1 tx per day).
- Develop regional community and research groups.
- Expand partnerships with blockchain institution leaders and community representatives.


The grant funds will help us integrate any new network on time and be used as community rewards to run giveaways to help boost the Ethereum and L2 ecosystem development.
answers.question: Outline your project's roadmap and how the grant funds will be used to achieve your development goals.

answers.answer:
MiniBridge has helped over 465K unique wallets to bridge assets among Ethereum and its various layer 2 networks, significantly contributing to decentralized on-chain TVL. 
MiniBridge has also launched a fork of Ethereum as BiteyeChain to record user transactions and rewards on the chain, leveraging Ethereum's decentralization and security. MiniBridge has completed a security code audit by ScaleBit, and processed over 786K transactions without any bugs or exploits.
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the decentralization and security of the Ethereum network?

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]—for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: MiniBridge
project.description:
Minibridge is a "zero-fee" cross-chain tool that offers multi-chain support for BTC/EVM/non-EVM and features such as fast transactions. It was developed by the Chaineye team specifically for users' small-amount transfer scenarios. Launched for 10 months, Minibridge has already processed 575K transactions and served 317K Web3 users. In user ratings on dappsheriff.com, Minibridge ranked first among all cross-chain bridge projects and was awarded "Best Tool of the Year" in the "PARTY AWARD 2024" annual selection by PA News.


Key Features
Chaineye was born from the Web3 community and we build products for the community’s needs. To better serve the community, Chaineye has built many free tools such as Onchain Map, CEX Transfer Fees, Multichain Gas, RPC List, etc. The Mini Bridge was designed specifically for retail investors with small-amount cross-chain transfer requests, including the following features:
1.	 Zero bridge fees: We don’t charge any bridge fees at all. This means users will get the same amount of assets on the destination chains. We are built for retail investors and we believe our community like free services. Only a minimum gas fee on the destination chain is charged.
2.	Fastest transactions: Our bridge has the fastest bridging experience across all existing bridges. The bridging time largely depends on the confirmation time of source and destination blockchains. We don’t want our users to wait any longer than the evitable blockchain transaction time. 
3.	Designed especially for small-amount transfer scenarios such as gas refill, airdrop claiming, moving funds, etc. It helps to save huge money and time for individual investors when doing so.
4.	Gas swap: Our community wants to use the destination chain directly after bridging. We get it! The gas swap feature allows users to swap a small amount of source chain ETH to the destination chain native gas token. It is very useful for those chains where ETH is not the native gas token such as BNB Chain, Polygon, ZetaChain, ZkFair, Avalanche, Map, Mantle, and Metis. 
5.	Fast Integration: Our team is monitoring the market closely and is ready to integrate the latest blockchains in time. Chaineye Mini Bridge currently supports a total of 24 networks including the latest Blast EVM L2 and Merlin BTC L2 blockchain.
6.	Open API: We have opened the API docs on our documentation site. Any individuals or third parties can go through the API and seamlessly integrate Mini Bridge into their application. Chaineye Mini Bridge works in the same style for both requests from our front-end UI and API endpoints.
7.	Security: To prevent the potential security concern of smart contracts, we have implemented our bridge in a hybrid style - a combination of EOA and smart contracts. EOA for cross-chain transfers and smart contracts for cross-chain gas swaps. It helps to reduce the possibility of contract exploitation. In addition, we have our entire system audited and scrutinized by our security partners.
8.	Rewards and Earn: Our users can enjoy a big bridge discount by participating in our various marketing campaigns. In addition, they can also earn referral rewards in ETH and $pMNB whenever their referred address makes a transfer. Everything is transparent and Chaineye Mini Bridge is built for the community.


Project Resource
Website: https://minibridge.chaineye.tools/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Chaineye_tools
Telegram: https://t.me/chaineye
Github: https://github.com/DeFiEye
Documentation: https://docs.chaineye.tools/
